p: There is no record in the scientific literature about the preventive and curative effect in vivo of any essential oil upon the Curvularia Leaf Spot disease. Nevertheless, [ 25] when studying another pathosystem, it demonstrated good results for the alternative control. Five treatments were tested with lemongrass and other essential oils against the helmintosporiosis of Tanzania grass ( Panicum maximum Jacq.) in preventive and curative effect.
